remarks: Change the index set to a subset by adding zeroes.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
statement:
esumss.p $e |- F/ k ph $.
esumss.a $e |- F/_ k A $.
esumss.b $e |- F/_ k B $.
esumss.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
esumss.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
esumss.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. B ) -> C e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumss.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = 0 ) $.
esumss $p |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A C = sum* k e. B C ) $.
